mapper.select: SELECT A.QNA_NUMBER, A.GOODS_NUMBER, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_THUMBNAIL, A.QNA_TITLE, A.QNA_CONTENT, A.QNA_REGDATE, A.QNA_REPSTATE, A.QNA_REPCONTENT, A.QNA_REPDATE FROM (SELECT * FROM GOODS NATURAL JOIN QNA) A WHERE QNA_CATEGORY = '상품문의' AND MEMBER_NUMBER = #{MEMBER_NUMBER} AND (QNA_REPSTATE = '답변대기' OR QNA_REPSTATE = '답변완료') GROUP BY A.QNA_NUMBER, A.GOODS_NUMBER, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_THUMBNAIL, A.QNA_TITLE, A.QNA_CONTENT, A.QNA_REGDATE, A.QNA_REPSTATE, A.QNA_REPCONTENT, A.QNA_REPDATE ORDER BY QNA_REGDATE DESC
